oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: none
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lloyd copies a memo from Mr A. Martin in which he has noted !nauxa and !khannumup's measurements, and other details of their personal information and history. 1) See also !khannumup (or Petros Willems): his personal history and !nauxa (or Willem) at the Museum, 24 September 1880, 2) This story is found in Book XVI-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memo for Miss Lloyd' (regarding some personal details of 'Petros Willems' and 'Willem') (a copy)
